title: Auto-placement in grid layout
summary: In addition to the ability to place items accurately onto a created grid, the CSS Grid Layout specification contains rules that control what happens when you create a grid and do not place some or all of the child items. You can see auto-placement in action in the simplest of ways by creating a grid on a set of items.
pageTitle: Auto-placement in grid layout - CSS: Cascading Style Sheets | MDN
